messages.message:
Hi Team, sharing a small observation while un-publishing a published application on AIHub.
While unpublishing an application, when I clicked on the un-publish button the application is unpublished in the backend but lands back to the application page having a similar feature as the app-run landing page with a note on top as `this application is outdated` instead of saying something like `application unpublishing was successful/failed` . Having a different landing page would also be helpful I guess which doesn't show app-run feature for the unpublished application. (sharing the screenshots from 2 different apps for just the reference)
cc: @hannah
Thanks for flagging this @Shubham! @Travis this is likely not the intended behavior.  @Shubham you will need to unpublish all versions of the app to disappear entirely

@hannah, It actually unpublished all of the versions so when I searched the same app on `Apps from Marketplace` this app wasn't there. But had to re-verify it via this way instead of getting the same confirmation at the first place.
got it thanks! yes we should have a confirmation it's been unpublished
